price: Kõ zã Mu sanya waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai kamar waɗanda suke mãsu barna ne a cikin ƙasa? Ko kuma za Mu sanya masu bin Allah da taƙawa kamar fãjirai makarkata?
arabic: أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ نَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلۡفُجَّارِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
